passive.name: VORACITY
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) VORACITY
                                Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her remaining ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.Katarina slashes at all nearby enemies whenever she picks up a Dagger, dealing 40 magic damage (40 (+15 ) + 100% bonus  + 30% (+4.5% ) ).

q.name: (Q) BOUNCING BLADE
q.description:
(Q) BOUNCING BLADE
 10/9/8/7s  
                                
                                
                                Throws a Dagger, dealing 75 magic damage (75/115/155/195 + 30%Â ) to the target and 2 nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets to the ground behind the initial strike point.The Dagger's time in the air is the same regardless of how many times it bounces.

w.name: (W) PREPARATION
w.description:
(W) PREPARATION
 14/13/12/11s  
                                
                                
                                Tosses a Dagger in the air and hastes Katarina by 50/60/70/80%.

e.name: (E) SHUNPO
e.description:
(E) SHUNPO
 14/12/10/8s  
                                
                                
                                Blink to a location near a Dagger or unit, dealing 49 magic damage (20/50/80/110 + 50%  + 30% ) to the nearest enemy.Picking up a Dagger greatly reduces the Cooldown of Shunpo.Range: 6

r.name: (R) DEATH LOTUS
r.description:
(R) DEATH LOTUS
 60/50/40s  
                                
                                
                                Rapidly throws blades at the 3 nearest enemy champions, dealing 400 magic damage (400/600/800 + 260% bonus  + 290% ) and applying Grievous Wounds. Katarina can move and throw blades for up to 2.6 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effect of Healing and Regeneration effects on 50%.While cast, Katarina's base movement speed is reduced to 125.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

situational_items_detailed.name: Crown Of The Shattered Queen

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
